project_descr: The main objective of this Grant is to develop, create consensus and implement a Regional Strategy for the Development of Statistics.

outputs.output_descr: The development and implementation of the “Statistical Capacity Building Project to Support the Designing and Implementation of a Regional Strategy for the Development of Statistics to Support Evidence-Based Policy Making.”

document_name: Statistical Capacity Building Project to Support the Designing and Implementation of a Regional Strategy for the Development of Statistics to Support Evidence Based Policy Making in the OECS
5th OECS Living Standards Measurement Committee October 2014
https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/BRB/ID 92062_5th OECS Living Standards Measurement Committee October 2014(2).docx
project_title: regional strategy on statistics for the oecs
